resources.string: Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.\n\nConsider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own!

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
Covid Detector helps you detect if you might have Covid-19 or not. This app will ask several questions and display the prediction of your current state

The goal is simple, choose the best possible answer for each question to get the most accurate prediction. If your answer is accurate the accuracy of the prediction will increase. At the end of the quiz if your prediction displays that you have Covid-19, please go to the nearest hospital to take a test.
